attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If I was to wear a t shirt saying FREEDOM 0 BROWNS POLICE STATE 1043 I have a high risk of being stopped under the terrorism act. what happend to freedom in this beloved England.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
